title: Kanthale hospital faces surgical crisis amid consultant shortage
byline: Base Hospital Kanthale has issued an urgent plea to the Ministry of Health for the immediate replacement of its Consultant Surgeon, whose recent absence has disrupted critical surgical services and forced the hospital to divert emergency cases to other facilities.

title: Government rules out any plans to offer ministerial portfolios to Douglas
byline: The government ruled out any plans to offer ministerial portfolios to EPDP leader former minister Douglas Devananda.
